description:
For nearly 50 years, David and Mary Macaree’s iconic 103 Hikes in Southwestern British Columbia has been the province’s most popular and most trusted hiking guide, with more than 100,000 copies sold. Author Stephen Hui carries on the Macarees’ legacy in 105 Hikes In and Around Southwestern British Columbia – an all-new, expanded follow-up inspired by the beloved classic.

With an additional selection of trails on the Gulf Islands and in Washington’s North Cascades, options for hiking with children, and rainy day recommendations, 105 Hikes covers a wider area and a wider range of abilities than its predecessor. Includes detailed information about how to get to each trailhead, distance, elevation gains, hiking times, ratings, shorter and longer options, and colour maps.
name: 105 Hikes In and Around Southwestern BC
